ComicInfo.Series: Jingle Belle: Santa Claus Vs. Frankenstein
ComicInfo.Summary: Inspired by Mary Shelley's original novel (sort of), the story of Frankenstein's monster takes a new twist when he is found by Jingle in the Arctic wastes and "rehabilitated" to fit in with the elves at Santa's Workshop. All goes well until an ultra-PC city declares Santa Claus taboo and awakens Frankie's monstrous side in a misguided attempt to help his friend. It's up to an ailing Santa and a reluctant Jingle Belle to stop their monstrous "apprentice" before he destroys the town and ruins the reputation of Christmas forever!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2025-01-04 22:24:48. [CVDB145089]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Greg Horn, Jorge Molina, Stephanie Gladden
ComicInfo.Characters: Frankenstein's Monster, Jingle Belle, Santa Claus
